      static void geoJsonifyMap(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap map, java.util.List<android.net.Uri> jsonUris, int color, android.content.Context context)
      Works just like geoJsonifyMap(GoogleMap, List, List, Context) except all the added GeoJson layers will be the same color
      static void geoJsonifyMap(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap map, java.util.List<android.net.Uri> jsonUris, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> jsonColors, android.content.Context context)
      Add GeoJson features to a Google Maps map.

      Works just like geoJsonifyMap(MapboxMap, List, List, Context) except all the added GeoJson layers will be the same color

      Add GeoJson features to a Mapbox map.
      static void geoJsonifyMap(org.osmdroid.views.MapView map, java.util.List<android.net.Uri> jsonUris, int color, android.content.Context context)
      Works just like geoJsonifyMap(MapView, List, List, Context) except all the added GeoJson layers will be the same color

      Add GeoJson features to a Open Street Maps map.

    • Method Detail

      • geoJsonifyMap

        public static void geoJsonifyMap(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap map,
                                 java.util.List<android.net.Uri> jsonUris,
                                 java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> jsonColors,
                                 android.content.Context context)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 org.json.JSONException
        Add GeoJson features to a Google Maps map. Accepts a list of uris, each one with a different .geojson file to parse Each layer will be added on top of the other based on the order in the list
        Parameters:
        map - GoogleMap object where to add GeoJson layers
        jsonUris - list of uris of .geojson files
        jsonColors - list of colors for each geojson layer
        context - application context
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if unable to open file
        org.json.JSONException - if unable to parse JSON content

      • geoJsonifyMap

        public static void geoJsonifyMap(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap map,
                                 java.util.List<android.net.Uri> jsonUris,
                                 int color,
                                 android.content.Context context)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 org.json.JSONException
        Works just like geoJsonifyMap(GoogleMap, List, List, Context) except all the added GeoJson layers will be the same color
        Parameters:
        color - color for all geojson layers
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.json.JSONException
        See Also:
        geoJsonifyMap(GoogleMap, List, List, Context)

                                 java.util.List<android.net.Uri> jsonUris,
                                 java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> jsonColors,
                                 android.content.Context context)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Add GeoJson features to a Mapbox map. Accepts a list of uris, each one with a different .geojson file to parse Each layer will be added on top of the other based on the order in the list
        Parameters:
        map - MapboxMap object where to add GeoJson layers
        jsonUris - list of uris of .geojson files
        jsonColors - list of colors for each geojson layer
        context - application context

        public static void geoJsonifyMap(org.osmdroid.views.MapView map,
                                 java.util.List<android.net.Uri> jsonUris,
                                 java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> jsonColors,
                                 android.content.Context context)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Add GeoJson features to a Open Street Maps map. Accepts a list of uris, each one with a different .geojson file to parse Each layer will be added on top of the other based on the order in the list
        Parameters:
        map - MapView object where to add GeoJson layers
        jsonUris - list of uris of .geojson files
        jsonColors - list of colors for each geojson layer
        context - application context
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if unable to open file
